definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)

sentences.english: An elephant hulked up suddenly before us.
sentences.chinese: 突然一頭大象赫然出現在我們的面前。

sentences.english: The haunted house on the hill brooded above the village.
sentences.chinese: 山上鬧鬼的房子赫然聳現在村莊之上。

sentences.english: The roadmap includes a measure of self-serving guff about the evils of shareholder democracy.
sentences.chinese: 有關股東民主弊病的利己廢話也赫然出現在路線圖中。

sentences.english: "What stands up in the end is structure, " Bearden says.
sentences.chinese: “最終赫然顯現出來的是結構，”比爾敦說道。

sentences.english: China , by contrast, is visible and center-stage.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中國赫然可見，處在舞臺的中央。

sentences.english: Silly eye, the inside impressively has an unfamiliar purse ugg tall cellular phone.
sentences.chinese: 傻眼了，裏面赫然有一個陌生的錢包和手機。

sentences.english: Hesitance and a nay - saying mentality will as visible as aredas a negative.
sentences.chinese: 猶豫和拒絕的心態將會是赫然醒目的，消極的信號。

sentences.english: Hesitance and a nay-saying mentality will be asvisible as a red tie and seen as a negative.
sentences.chinese: 猶豫和拒絕的心態將會是赫然醒目的，消極的信號。

sentences.english: And seeing that it was a soft October night.
sentences.chinese: 溫柔的十月夜赫然在目。

definition: wide and open/a flash of understanding
to appear before (one's eyes)/to come to (one's mind)
to take the lead/to be first to start
numerous and close together/densely packed/thickly dotted/thick/dense
